name: My High Pony Dog Magic Creator :Free DressUp Games
name_original: My High Pony Dog Magic Creator :Free DressUp Games
description:
Rumor has it in Pony Pet city that the annual cute Pony Pet contest will be next week. You quickly check on the Internet only to see that this is indeed true. You have only seven days to match up against the city’s most fashionable ponies!!!

Pony Pet Dress Up puts you in a situation where you can show your fashion and dress up your own unique and unbelievably sweet monster pony. Only in this way you can achieve a version that is fitting for a winner in the city’s best pony contest.

Get your groove on and put that fashion taste and creativity into good use. Create the cutest little Pony Pet with the most outstanding and fashionable clothes and accessories.

------ How to Play ------


Pony Pet Dress up has a simple and fun gameplay. You can dress up your little pony pet by customizing every piece of clothing and accessory. The game is rich on customization so you can achieve whatever fashion ideas you have in mind.

You can customise your pony’s hair, head accessory, dress, necklace and environment.

The game is free to play. You can however pay a small fee to have specific pony models , as well as high class accessories or pieces of clothing unlocked.

What are you waiting for? Download Now!!
